title: Persona 3 Portable: Velvet Blue
original_name: ペルソナ 3 ポータブル ベルベットブルー
sinopse:
Taking place during Persona 3 Portable, it features Elizabeth as its protagonist and explores Persona 3's female protagonist's relationship with the inhabitants of the Velvet Room, including Margaret and Theodore.

(Source: Megami Tensei Wikia)
